question: A grocery company found a way to keep fresh foods from spoiling when transporting them long distances. How might this new technology help people in Hawaii?
candidate_answers: (A) by increasing the types of food available in stores (B) by decreasing the amount of food sold in stores (C) by increasing the time it takes to shop in stores (D) by decreasing the number of stores
answer: by increasing the types of food available in stores
label: A
